text:
Granify - Edmonton, Canada - http://www.granify.com/careers - Local/VISA

We use digital psychology and data science to help online retailers convert shoppers that otherwise wouldn't purchase.

Backed by Peter Thiel and others, benefits of a startup with financial stability.

Positions:

-Senior Ruby Developer

-Senior JS Developer

-VP Technology

-Director of Product Management

-Senior Product Manager

-Data Scientist

Awesome team, great benefits, stock options possible.
